reviews.text: Family-owned showroom since 1976 selling brand-name pools, spas & supplies, plus BBQs & accessories. 6703 Colleyville Blvd, Colleyville, TX 76034
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"If your looking for QUALITY service and maintenance give them." "Small company with great customer service." "Hart Pool did a fantastic job with pool heater and gas line installation!!!"

We called Hart Pool to give us an estimate on a new pool pump. Alan and Rebecca in the office was super helpful and informative, they were able to schedule someone to come out and replace our pump in a very timely manner. Took our pool from green to clean in less than 72 hours. Highly recommend them for your pool needs. More

I first moved to Fort Worth (far Southwest Fort Worth) at the end of July 2023 into a house with a pool and had no idea how to take care of it. I was looking for a certain brand of chlorine and only Hart Pool carried it. I met Alan there … More

What a wonderfully helpful local pool supply and repair shop! They saved us so much trouble, helping us fix up our Polaris 360 right there in person. It ran like a champ again, right after the in-store repair! We learned a lot just chatting during our visit.
